summary: Everyone has a special ability.Dragonborn too
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Description
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod adds 113 special ability and 12 special weakness.Its random of course.All abilities and weaknesses have 3 stage.I hope you enjoy with this mod
[/size][/font]
